title: 1895 S. Logan
posting_body: FEATURES: Low-maintenance lawn (artificial turf), large corner lot, large backyard, well-lit office, laundry, two full kitchens with appliances, covered parking and storage!
Trash removal through City of Denver.
All other utilities paid by tenant.
Two bedrooms on the main floor, two bedrooms in the basement.
Two full bathrooms - one on the main floor and one in the basement.
Two refrigerators, stoves, dishwashers and sinks with garbage disposals!
HEAT/COOLING: Forced air furnace, window AC for cooling (as-is).
FENCING: Fully fenced yard with three entrances.
Pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.
Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.
**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.
LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12 month extensions possible at that time
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
